lead_paragraph: A 170-foot crane at a construction site for the extension of the No. 7 subway line collapsed on Tuesday night in Manhattan, killing one worker and injuring four other people.

byline.contributor: Christine Haughney, Randy Leonard, Colin Moynihan and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

snippet: A 170-foot crane at a construction site for the extension of the No. 7 subway line collapsed on Tuesday night in Manhattan, killing one worker and injuring four other people....
abstract: Crane at Manhattan construction site for the extension of the No. 7 subway line collapses, killing one worker and injuring four other people; investigators speculate that some mechanism in the rear of the crane failed, causing it to become unbalanced and then collapse.

headline.main: One Killed and Four Hurt in Crane Collapse on West Side
headline.seo: One Is Killed and Four Are Hurt in Crane Collapse on West Side
headline.print_headline: Man Is Killed and 4 Are Hurt in West Side Crane Collapse
